mapper.insert:

group_id, hos_id, copy_code, dis_a_no,
dispose_type,
note,
create_emp,
create_date,
audit_emp,
apply_date,
state,
) VALUES (
#{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dis_a_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dispose_type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

to_date(#{create_date},'YYYY-MM-DD'),
#{audit_emp,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{apply_date,jdbcType=DATE},
#{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}
)

INSERT INTO ASS_DISPOSAL_A_House ( group_id,hos_id,copy_code,dis_a_no,dispose_type,note, create_emp,create_date,audit_emp,apply_date,state )
select #{item.group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dis_a_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dispose_type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.create_emp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, to_date(#{item.create_date},'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{item.audit_emp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.apply_date,jdbcType=DATE}, #{item.state,jdbcType=INTEGER} from dual
mapper.select:
SELECT a.group_id, a.hos_id, a.copy_code, a.dis_a_no, a.dispose_type,dt.dispose_type_name, a.note, a.create_emp,su2.user_name as create_emp_name, a.create_date, a.audit_emp,su3.user_name as audit_emp_name, a.apply_date, a.state, case when a.state = 0 then '新建' when a.state = 1 then '审核' when a.state = 2 then '申报确认' else '' end state_name FROM ASS_DISPOSAL_A_House a left join ass_dispose_type dt on a.dispose_type = dt.dispose_type_code left join sys_user su2 on a.group_id = su2.group_id and a.hos_id = su2.hos_id and a.create_emp = su2.user_id
left join sys_user su3 on a.group_id = su3.group_id and a.hos_id = su3.hos_id and a.audit_emp = su3.user_id where a.group_id = #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND a.hos_id = #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND a.copy_code = #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND a.dis_a_no = #{dis_a_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

{call PKG_ASS_APP.prc_CalcDepreSingle( #{group_id,jdbcType=INTEGER, mode=IN}, #{hos_id,jdbcType=INTEGER, mode=IN}, #{copy_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{ass_year,jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{ass_month,jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{ass_naturs,jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{ass_card_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, 'A', #{ass_json_str,jdbcType=VARCHAR,mode=OUT}, #{ass_AppCode,jdbcType=INTEGER,mode=OUT}, #{ass_ErrTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR,mode=OUT} )}
